question: 詐欺
sourceMnemonic: If there are <kanji>lie</kanji>s and <kanji>deceit</kanji> in your interactions with people, you're committing <vocabulary>fraud</vocabulary>, you're carrying out a <vocabulary>scam</vocabulary>, you're <vocabulary>swindling</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
